list.title: 保存验收通知单
list.req_body_other: {"type":"object","title":"empty object","properties":{"buyer_id":{"type":"string","description":"采购员ID"},"city":{"type":"string","description":"城市ID"},"supplier_id":{"type":"string","description":"供应商ID"},"company_id":{"type":"string","description":"公司ID"},"contract_number":{"type":"string","description":"合同编号"},"order_number":{"type":"string","description":"订单编号"},"supplier_order_number":{"type":"string","description":"供应商订单编号"},"asset_name":{"type":"string","description":"资产名称"},"specification":{"type":"string","description":"规格型号"},"asset_type":{"type":"string","description":"资产类型"},"asset_class":{"type":"string","description":"资产小类"},"expected_date":{"type":"string","description":"预计到货日期"},"remained_amount":{"type":"number","description":"合同剩余数量"},"arrival_amount":{"type":"number","description":"到货数量"},"invoice_type":{"type":"string","description":"发票类型"},"tax_rate":{"type":"string","description":"专票税率"},"unit_price":{"type":"number","description":"单价"},"currency":{"type":"string","description":"币种"},"exchange_rate":{"type":"number","description":"汇率"},"user_id":{"type":"string","description":"使用人ID"},"location":{"type":"string","description":"使用地点"},"remarks":{"type":"string","description":"备注"}},"required":[]}
